title: seetha naayakaa
sahitya:
sItA nAyaka shrtajana pOSaka shrI raghukula tilaka O rAma

caraNam 1

 nirupEda bhaktula karikOTa baDalEka giripai nekkukoNTivO (shrI venkaTa giripai)
   
caraNam 2

 angalrpu jUci rangapuramuna celangucu paNDitivO (rangapuramuna celangucu)
   
caraNam 3

 gAcina bahktula jUci A balinE yAcinci veDalitivO (A balinE yAcinci)
   
caraNam 4

 Asaminci ninnAshu jErErani kIshula jEritivO (jErErani kIshula vA jEritivO)
   
caraNam 5

 jAlitO vaccu kucEluni kani gOpi cElamu lettitivO (kani gOpi cElamu)
   
caraNam 6

 ingita merigi uppongucu brOce bangAru doravaitivO (nanu brOcE)
   
caraNam 7

 nI guNamulu gaTTu bAguga delisenu tyAgarAja vinuta (dElsenayya)
